imdb.plot outline: The answer is simple - it's a Dish A Day. Belgian cooking is highly regarded the world over, and celebrated in this fresh, daily cooking show in which a personable young chef cooks up delicious, nutritious meals in minutes. Mindful of both the clock and budget, each day sees him preparing super simple, tasty dishes that anyone at home can replicate, bringing a new twist to old classics, or recreating the best of modern cuisine.
imdb.title: A Dish a Day
plot: Ever wondered what on earth to make for dinner? Lost for ideas, lacking in inspiration?

The answer is simple - it's a Dish A Day. Belgian cooking is highly regarded the world over, and celebrated in this fresh, daily cooking show in which a personable young chef cooks up delicious, nutritious meals in minutes. Mindful of both the clock and budget, each day sees him preparing super simple, tasty dishes that anyone at home can replicate, bringing a new twist to old classics, or recreating the best of modern cuisine.
